name: Altar Flame Golem
description: The Altar Flame Golem is a large construct, characterized by its fiery essence and solid form, resembling an altar adorned with an eternal flame. Its body is made of hot stone, radiating heat and visually intimidating.
memorable: The golem is unique due to its ability to absorb fire damage, regaining health instead of taking it, and its devastating explosion upon destruction, making it a tactical challenge for adventurers.
goals: Primarily serves as a guardian for sacred sites or important locations, protecting them from intruders.
relations: May be found alongside other constructs or fire-based creatures, particularly in areas of worship or ancient ruins.
environment: Typically located in sacred grounds, ancient temples, or places of eternal flame.
strengths: Immunity to fire, poison, and psychic damage; resilience against nonmagical attacks; ability to regain hit points from fire damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage, which can severely impair its combat effectiveness.
attacks: Can perform melee slam attacks that deal both bludgeoning and additional fire damage, with the powerful Flame Breath to engulf multiple targets in flames.
most_powerful_ability: Death Burst - Explodes upon being destroyed, dealing significant fire damage to all nearby creatures.
additional_information: Disguises itself as an altar while motionless, making it a deceptive guardian.
Immune to many debilitating effects and conditions.
Absorbs fire damage without harm, making it particularly resilient in flame-heavy environments.
Magic attacks are particularly effective due to its magical weapon attacks.
Has a low Dexterity, making it less agile in combat.
